about_the_company: Capgemini is a global leader in engineering and R&D services, combining broad industry knowledge and cutting-edge technologies in digital and software. It supports the convergence of the physical and digital worlds and helps clients accelerate their journey towards Intelligent Industry. Capgemini Engineering has over 55,000 team members in more than 30 countries across various sectors.
job_responsibilities: Design, architect, and write documentation for entire systems
Identify and fix issues within their area of expertise
Proactively create and review team contributions
Participate as a code owner and partner with collaborators in code reviews
Automate unit, integration, and end-to-end testing solutions
Deploy solutions across environments and platforms, including production releases
Provide operational support of code and all code within their domain
Teardown old solutions, products, and resources when no longer needed
Resolve issues within the team and prevent problems from occurring
Be proactive and identify, resolve, mitigate, and prevent technical issues and risks
required_education: Computer Science degree or equivalent experience
